trans-unit.source: Provides the content for a high fidelity, fixed-format page.
trans-unit.target: 提供最佳畫質、固定格式頁面的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is typically used to provide the content for a page within a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> 通常用來提供內容內的頁面<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> automatically defines page breaks at the start and end of its content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> 自動定義分頁符號的開始和結束其內容。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> used for rendering the page background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />，用於呈現頁面背景。

trans-unit.source: The brush for rendering the page background.
trans-unit.target: 用於呈現頁面背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Background%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Background%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Background" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a rectangle defining the overflow area for bleeds, registration marks, and crop marks.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定一個矩形，這個矩形會定義出血、十字線對位標記和裁切線的溢位區域。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> defining the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: 定義溢位區域的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A> is used to specify an expanded area for print production-related bleeds, registration marks, and crop marks that may extend outside the logical page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A> 用來指定列印產出相關滲漏、 註冊標記，以及可能會延伸到的邏輯頁面之外的裁切線的擴充的區域。

trans-unit.source: The logical page is the part of the sheet that will remain after it has been cropped to its final size.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯頁面屬於的工作表，為其最終大小裁剪後仍會保留。

trans-unit.source: So the dimensions of the bleed box can be no smaller than the logical page size, but may be greater.
trans-unit.target: 因此滲漏方塊的大小可能會不小於邏輯頁面大小，但可能更大。

trans-unit.source: Contrast the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A> with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A> which is the area of the page on which content can appear; that is, the part of the page that is *within* the margins.
trans-unit.target: 對比<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>與<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>這是在其可以顯示內容; 頁面的區域即是該頁面的一部分*內*邊界。

trans-unit.source: So the dimensions of the content box can be no larger than the page, but may be smaller.
trans-unit.target: 因此，內容方塊的維度可以是不能大於頁面上，但可能較小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A> properties of both the bleed box and the content box are measured from the left and the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A> properties are measured from the top.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>滲漏方塊和內容方塊的內容會測量從左邊和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>屬性以從頂端。

trans-unit.source: Hence, the following rules must be enforced in defining the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>:
trans-unit.target: 因此，下列規則必須強制執行定義<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be less than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必須小於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be less than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必須小於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必須是大於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必須是大於或等於<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Bottom" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Bottom" /> 附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage" /> 子項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" /> of the child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子項目 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Children%2A> returns `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> is data-bound and child elements cannot be added or removed manually.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Children%2A> 傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>是資料繫結和子系項目無法加入或手動移除。

trans-unit.source: In non data-bound uses, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Children%2A> allows the application to manually <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Remove%2A> child elements.
trans-unit.target: 在非資料繫結使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Children%2A>手動允許應用程式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection.Remove%2A>子項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bounding rectangle of the content area; that is, the area of the page *within* the margins, if any.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容區域的週框，亦即在邊界「之內」的頁面區域 (若有的話)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that defines the content area.
trans-unit.target: 定義內容區域的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />。

trans-unit.source: The following rules must be enforced in defining the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>:
trans-unit.target: 定義下列規則必須強制執行<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be greater than or equal to zero (0), and less than or equal to (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>-1).
trans-unit.target: 必須是大於或等於零 (0)，且小於或等於 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>-1)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be greater than or equal to zero (0), and less than or equal to (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>-1).
trans-unit.target: 必須是大於或等於零 (0)，且小於或等於 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>-1)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Right%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be greater than or equal to (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>+1).
trans-unit.target: 必須是大於或等於 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Left%2A>+ 1)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Bottom%2A>

trans-unit.source: must be greater than or equal to (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>.<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>+1).
trans-unit.target: 必須是大於或等於 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>。<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Top%2A>+ 1)。

trans-unit.source: For rules about the relative sizes of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>, see the topic <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 相關的相對大小的規則<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A>，請參閱主題<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.BleedBox%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: - Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: - None
trans-unit.target: - None

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.ContentBox" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the bottom offset.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得底端位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目底端與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 底端之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目底端與其父代畫布底端之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: If the bottom offset has not been set, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetBottom%2A> returns <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未設定底端位移，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetBottom%2A>傳回<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the left offset.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得左位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the left side of an element and the left side of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目左邊與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 左邊之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the right side of an element and the right side of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目右邊與其父代畫布右邊之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: If the left offset has not been set, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetRight%2A> returns <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未設定左的位移，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetRight%2A>傳回<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the property.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得屬性的項目物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.NavigateUri" /> property for a given element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回給定項目的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.NavigateUri" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of <paramref name="element" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 的 <paramref name="element" />。

trans-unit.source: If the attached property has not been set, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetNavigateUri%2A> returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未設定附加的屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetNavigateUri%2A>傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the right offset.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得右位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the right side of an element and the right side of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目右邊與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 右邊之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the right side of an element and the right side of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目右邊與其父代畫布右邊之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: If the right offset has not been set, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetRight%2A> returns <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未設定右位移，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetRight%2A>傳回<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the top offset.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得頂端位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the top of an element and the top of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回項目頂端與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 頂端之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the top of an element and the top of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目頂端與其父代畫布頂端之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: If the top offset has not been set, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetTop%2A> returns <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未設定的最上層的位移，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.GetTop%2A>傳回<xref:System.Double.NaN>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Left" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Left" /> 附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.NavigateUri" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.NavigateUri" /> 附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that is associated with the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此頁面關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> for the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> contains information about how material should be printed; for example, whether or not two-sided printing should be used.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>告訴您如何列印資料; 例如，是否使用雙面列印應。

trans-unit.source: Setting this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.PrintTicket%2A> property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.PrintTicket%2A> 屬性不會驗證或修改特定 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 的指定 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>。

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: 如有需要，請使用 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> 方法建立對指定的印表機有效的 <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> 專用 <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.PrintTicket" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.PrintTicket" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Right" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Right" /> 附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the bottom offset.
trans-unit.target: 要設定底端位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: The new distance between the bottom side of the element and the bottom side of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目底邊與其父代畫布底邊之間的新距離。

trans-unit.source: Sets the distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目底端與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 底端之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The child element's bottom offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 子項目的底端位移不會影響父項畫布的大小。

trans-unit.source: If both a top and a bottom offset have been specified on the same element, the top offset takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在相同的項目上指定的頂端和底端位移，頂端位移的優先順序較高。

trans-unit.source: When setting the bottom offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the size of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 當設定下方的位移，以百分比表示，百分比值為基礎的父項畫布大小。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the left offset.
trans-unit.target: 要設定左位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: The new distance between the left side of the element and the left side of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目左邊與其父代畫布左邊之間的新距離。

trans-unit.source: Sets the distance between the left side of an element and the left side of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目左邊與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 左邊之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The child element's left offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 子項目的向左的位移不會影響父項畫布的大小。

trans-unit.source: If both a left and right offset have been specified on the same element, the left offset takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在相同的元素指定同時左側和右側的位移，左的位移的優先順序較高。

trans-unit.source: When setting the left offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the width of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 設定時左的位移以百分比表示，百分比值根據與父項畫布的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.SetLeft%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.SetLeft%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the URI offset.
trans-unit.target: 要設定 URI 位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to navigate to when a hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下超連結時會巡覽至 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to navigate to when a hyperlink is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 設定按一下超連結時會巡覽至[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the right offset.
trans-unit.target: 要設定右位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: The new distance between the right side of the element and the right side of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目右邊與其父代畫布右邊之間的新距離。

trans-unit.source: Sets the distance between the right side of an element and the right side of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目右邊與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 右邊之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The child element's right offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 子項目的右位移不會影響父項畫布的大小。

trans-unit.source: If both a left and a right offset have been specified on the same element, the left offset takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在相同的元素指定左和右位移，左的位移的優先順序較高。

trans-unit.source: When setting the right offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the width of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 設定向右位移時以百分比表示，百分比值根據與父項畫布的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the top offset.
trans-unit.target: 要設定頂端位移的項目。

trans-unit.source: The new distance between the top side of the element and the top side of its parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 項目頂端與其父代畫布頂端之間的新距離。

trans-unit.source: Sets the distance between the top of an element and the top of its parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 設定項目頂端與其父代 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas" /> 頂端之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The child element's top offset does not affect the size of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 子項目上方的位移不會影響父項畫布的大小。

trans-unit.source: If both a top and bottom offset have been specified on the same element, the top offset takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定最上層及下方的位移在相同的元素，頂端位移的優先順序較高。

trans-unit.source: When setting the top offset as a percentage, the percentage value is based on the size of the parent canvas.
trans-unit.target: 當設定頂端位移以百分比表示，百分比值是會根據與父項畫布的大小。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.SetTop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.SetTop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的子物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入物件中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the current application context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前應用程式內容的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the application context.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式內容的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Top" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage.Top" /> 附加屬性。
